mapper.select: SELECT cm.member_id, cm.club_id, cm.towner_id, tw.towner_name, tw.email, tw.password, tw.gender FROM club_member cm JOIN towner tw ON cm.towner_id = tw.towner_id WHERE cm.club_id = #{clubId} AND tw.email = #{memberEmail}
SELECT cm.member_id, cm.club_id, cm.towner_id, tw.towner_name, tw.email, tw.password, tw.gender FROM club_member cm JOIN towner tw ON cm.towner_id = tw.towner_id WHERE cm.club_id = #{clubId}

SELECT c.club_id, c.club_name, c.description, c.open_date, adm.towner_id, adm.towner_name, adm.email, adm.password, adm.gender FROM club c JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_id = cm.club_id JOIN towner mem ON cm.towner_id = mem.towner_id JOIN towner adm ON c.admin_id = adm.towner_id WHERE mem.email = #{memberEmail}

SELECT c.club_id, c.club_name, c.description, c.open_date, adm.towner_id, adm.towner_name, adm.email, adm.password, adm.gender FROM club c JOIN towner adm ON c.admin_id = adm.towner_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM club_member cm JOIN towner tw ON cm.towner_id = tw.towner_id WHERE cm.club_id = c.club_id AND tw.email = #{memberEmail} )
